S:log-item.D:comment:
DERBY-6178 AutoloadTest does not proprogate original jvm -D flags to spawned JVM, leading to LAB regression test failures
backport of change #1467664 from trunk to 10.10 branch.
This change disables the AutoloadTest when a non-default base port is passed to the test run. Currently the test does not work correctly for multiple concurrent runs using different base ports.
